scripts.packager-mac: rm -rf ./OutApp & electron-packager ./ zoomsdkapp --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --out ./OutApp --electron-version=5.0.13 --overwrite --icon=./app.icns&& yes|cp -R  -H ../lib ./OutApp/zoomsdkapp-darwin-x64/zoomsdkapp.app/Contents/Resources/ && rm -rf ../sdk/win32 && rm -rf ../sdk/win64 && yes|cp -R  -H ../sdk ./OutApp/zoomsdkapp-darwin-x64/zoomsdkapp.app/Contents/Resources/ &&yes|cp -R  -H ../sdk/mac/Plugins ./OutApp/zoomsdkapp-darwin-x64/zoomsdkapp.app/Contents/ && yes|cp -R  -H ../sdk/mac/Resources ./OutApp/zoomsdkapp-darwin-x64/zoomsdkapp.app/Contents/&& yes|cp -R  -H ../sdk/mac/ZoomSDK/* ./OutApp/zoomsdkapp-darwin-x64/zoomsdkapp.app/Contents/Frameworks
